name: Pork Duels
description:
Pork Duels is a two player PVP game. Each player plays as a star pig, whose goal is to bounce on clouds, not fall out of the sky, and land on the others’ head to attack. Look out for powerups, which can help you throughout your long battle.

This game was made by me for my Intro to Game Development class at NYU using Gamemaker over the course of 1-1.5 months in the Winter of 2020.

Music Credit goes to Metalman 1349, and other sound effects credit goes to freesound.org.
